response.original_title: Joined - The World of Siamese Twins
response.overview: Through in-depth interviews and exclusive footage, gain unique insight into the lives of those directly impacted by this rare condition â€“ from dedicated surgeons to resilient conjoined twins themselves. Delving into the stories of various conjoined twins, both past and present, this eye-opening two-part series sheds light on their unique challenges and triumphs.  Follow the emotional journey of Allison and David Lawler, as they eagerly anticipate the arrival of their conjoined twin daughters. With the twins joined at the heart, witness the couple's heart-wrenching decisions and the daunting reality of slim chances for successful separation.
response.title: Joined - The World of Siamese Twins
